mapper.select: SELECT a.account_id, a.account_name, a.password, a.status_delete, r.id_role, r.name_role FROM accounts a JOIN role r ON r.id_role = a.role_id WHERE a.account_name = #{accountName}
mapper.update: UPDATE accounts a SET a.account_name = #{accountName}, a.password = #{password}, a.version_account = a.version_account + 1 WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId}
